plan:
Welcome to Kathmandu - your perfect getaway awaits!
            
            With Clouds weather and temperatures around 24°C, 
            this is an ideal time to explore everything Kathmandu has to offer.
            
            Your $10000 budget allows for a comfortable mix of must-see attractions, 
            authentic local experiences, and hidden gems that make Kathmandu truly special. 
            
            From world-class dining to cultural landmarks, every moment of your journey 
            has been thoughtfully planned to create unforgettable memories.

activities: Morning: Arrive in Kathmandu, check-in, and explore the city center
Afternoon: Walking tour of Kathmandu's main attractions
Evening: Welcome dinner at a traditional restaurant in Kathmandu
Morning: Visit Kathmandu's main museums and cultural sites
Afternoon: Explore traditional neighborhoods in Kathmandu
Evening: Traditional cultural show or performance in Kathmandu
Morning: Early morning hike or nature walk in Kathmandu
Afternoon: Outdoor adventure activities around Kathmandu
Evening: Sunset viewing and evening nature activities in Kathmandu

Afternoon: Hands-on cultural workshop in Kathmandu
Evening: Evening with local families or community events in Kathmandu
Morning: Discover lesser-known attractions in Kathmandu
Afternoon: Visit off-the-beaten-path locations in Kathmandu
Evening: Discover Kathmandu's secret evening spots
Morning: Morning yoga or spa session in Kathmandu
Afternoon: Leisure time at parks or wellness centers in Kathmandu
Evening: Evening relaxation and wellness activities in Kathmandu
Morning: Explore traditional markets and local crafts in Kathmandu
Afternoon: Shopping districts and local boutiques in Kathmandu
Evening: Night markets and evening shopping in Kathmandu
Morning: Tour historical landmarks and monuments in Kathmandu
Afternoon: Deep dive into Kathmandu's historical sites
Evening: Evening historical walking tour in Kathmandu

Try local cuisine and specialties
Learn basic local phrases
Respect local customs and traditions

plan:
Welcome to Nepal - your perfect getaway awaits!
            
            With Clear weather and temperatures around 26°C, 
            this is an ideal time to explore everything Nepal has to offer.
            
            Your $10000 budget allows for a comfortable mix of must-see attractions, 
            authentic local experiences, and hidden gems that make Nepal truly special. 
            
            From world-class dining to cultural landmarks, every moment of your journey 
            has been thoughtfully planned to create unforgettable memories.

activities: Morning: Private arrival transfer to Dwarika's Hotel with welcome drinks. Settle into luxury suite with Himalayan views ($0 - included in accommodation)
Afternoon: Private guided tour of Patan Durbar Square with expert art historian. Visit Golden Temple and Patan Museum ($150 for guide and entrance fees)
Evening: Welcome dinner at Krishnarpan Restaurant with 6-course traditional Newari feast and cultural performance ($120 per person)
Morning: Sunrise visit to Swayambhunath Stupa (Monkey Temple) with private guide. Photography session with professional local photographer ($200 for guide and photographer)
Afternoon: Private shopping tour in Asan Bazaar with personal shopper. Visit traditional handicraft workshops and Thamel boutiques ($300 shopping budget)
Evening: Cocktails at Royal Singi Hotel's rooftop bar followed by modern Nepali cuisine at OR2K restaurant in Thamel ($90 per person)
Morning: Helicopter flight to Nagarkot for breathtaking Himalayan panorama breakfast ($600 per person for private helicopter)
Afternoon: Luxury spa treatment at Dwarika's Resort with traditional Ayurvedic massage and yoga session ($150 per person)
Evening: Private cooking class with celebrity Nepali chef learning to prepare momos and dal bhat, followed by dinner ($180 per person)
Morning: Private charter flight to Pokhara. Transfer to Temple Tree Resort & Spa luxury villas ($400 for charter flight for group)
Afternoon: Lakeside luxury boat cruise on Phewa Lake with champagne and canapés. Visit Tal Barahi Temple ($120 for private boat and refreshments)
Evening: Sunset paragliding experience from Sarangkot with professional pilots and photography package ($150 per person)
Morning: Guided hike to World Peace Pagoda through rhododendron forests with naturalist guide ($100 for guide and transportation)
Afternoon: Lunch at The Old Inn followed by exploration of Gupteshwor Cave and David's Fall ($50 entrance fees)
Evening: Lakeside fine dining at Moondance Restaurant with live jazz music and international cuisine ($80 per person)
Morning: Private helicopter tour to Annapurna Base Camp for sunrise views and breakfast amidst Himalayas ($700 per person)
Afternoon: Relaxation at resort infinity pool with mountain views. Private yoga and meditation session ($60 per person)
Evening: Traditional Nepali thali dinner at Busy Bee Cafe with live folk music performance ($50 per person)
Morning: Scenic drive to Chitwan National Park. Check into Tigerland Safari Resort luxury jungle villas ($0 - included in accommodation)
Afternoon: Private elephant safari through national park with expert naturalist guide ($150 per person)
Evening: Candlelit dinner at resort with Tharu cultural dance performance and jungle storytelling ($80 per person)
Morning: Canoe ride on Rapti River for bird watching and wildlife spotting with binoculars provided ($60 per person)
Afternoon: Visit Elephant Breeding Center and Tharu village cultural tour with local guide ($40 per person)
Evening: Sunset cocktails at riverside bar followed by gourmet jungle-to-table dining experience ($90 per person)
Morning: Private return flight to Kathmandu. Last-minute souvenir shopping at Cottage Industries ($200 shopping budget)
Afternoon: Farewell lunch at Boudha Stupa rooftop restaurant with stunning monastery views ($60 per person)
Evening: Private transfer to Tribhuvan International Airport for departure ($50 for luxury van transfer)
recommendations: Book domestic flights and helicopter tours at least 2 months in advance
Carry USD cash for local markets and smaller establishments
Respect religious sites by dressing modestly and removing shoes
Hire private guides for enhanced cultural experiences
Try local delicacies like momos, dal bhat, and Newari cuisine
Pack layers as temperatures can vary significantly
Purchase travel insurance covering adventure activities
Learn basic Nepali phrases for enhanced cultural connection
Carry altitude medication if sensitive to high elevations
Negotiate prices in markets but be respectful about bargaining

daily_plan.afternoon: Private guided tour of Patan Durbar Square with expert art historian. Visit Golden Temple and Patan Museum ($150 for guide and entrance fees)
daily_plan.evening: Welcome dinner at Krishnarpan Restaurant with 6-course traditional Newari feast and cultural performance ($120 per person)

plan:
Welcome to Dharan - your perfect getaway awaits!
            
            With Clear weather and temperatures around 29°C, 
            this is an ideal time to explore everything Dharan has to offer.
            
            Your $10000 budget allows for a comfortable mix of must-see attractions, 
            authentic local experiences, and hidden gems that make Dharan truly special. 
            
            From world-class dining to cultural landmarks, every moment of your journey 
            has been thoughtfully planned to create unforgettable memories.

activities: Morning: Private guided tour of Bhedetar View Tower and surrounding tea gardens with professional photography session. Enjoy panoramic views of Himalayas and Terai plains while learning about local tea cultivation.

Afternoon: Luxury spa treatments at Dharan Wellness Retreat followed by private cooking class with master chef focusing on traditional Limbu and Rai cuisine. Includes hands-on preparation of local delicacies.
Evening: Exclusive rooftop dinner at The Himalayan Heights Restaurant with live folk music performance. Private table with 180-degree mountain views and personalized wine pairing service.

Morning: Private helicopter tour to nearby mountain ranges with landing at scenic viewpoint for breakfast picnic. Professional photographer included to capture aerial shots of Dharan and surrounding landscapes.

Afternoon: Cultural immersion experience at local indigenous villages with private guide and translator. Visit traditional homes, participate in cultural ceremonies, and enjoy authentic tribal lunch prepared by local families.
Evening: VIP experience at Dharan's premium nightclub with private booth, dedicated server, and premium beverage package. Followed by late-night gourmet street food tour with personal food guide.
recommendations: Book helicopter tour at least 2 weeks in advance
Carry local currency for village visits and tips
Respect indigenous customs during cultural visits
Hire English-speaking private driver for convenience
Try local specialties like tongba (millet beer) and yomari

daily_plan.morning: Private guided tour of Bhedetar View Tower and surrounding tea gardens with professional photography session. Enjoy panoramic views of Himalayas and Terai plains while learning about local tea cultivation.
daily_plan.afternoon: Luxury spa treatments at Dharan Wellness Retreat followed by private cooking class with master chef focusing on traditional Limbu and Rai cuisine. Includes hands-on preparation of local delicacies.
daily_plan.evening: Exclusive rooftop dinner at The Himalayan Heights Restaurant with live folk music performance. Private table with 180-degree mountain views and personalized wine pairing service.

plan:
Welcome to Tokyo - your perfect getaway awaits!
            
            With Clouds weather and temperatures around 16°C, 
            this is an ideal time to explore everything Tokyo has to offer.
            
            Your $10000 budget allows for a comfortable mix of must-see attractions, 
            authentic local experiences, and hidden gems that make Tokyo truly special. 
            
            From world-class dining to cultural landmarks, every moment of your journey 
            has been thoughtfully planned to create unforgettable memories.

activities: Morning: Private guided tour of Senso-ji Temple and Asakusa district including Nakamise shopping street with photography opportunities (Cost: $200 for private guide)
Afternoon: Traditional multi-course kaiseki lunch at Kikunoi (3 Michelin stars) followed by Sumida River cruise (Cost: $400 lunch, $60 cruise)
Evening: Exclusive omakase dinner at Sukiyabashi Jiro (sushi experience) followed by cocktails at The Bellustar Tokyo sky bar with panoramic city views (Cost: $600 dinner, $100 drinks)
Morning: Private helicopter tour over Tokyo skyline and Mount Fuji (1.5 hours) with professional photography service (Cost: $1500 for two)
Afternoon: Luxury shopping experience in Ginza at flagship stores (Chanet, Louis Vuitton, Mikimoto) with personal shopper (Cost: $200 shopping service fee, shopping expenses separate)
Evening: Michelin-starred tempura experience at Tempura Kondo followed by exclusive members-only jazz club in Roppongi (Cost: $300 dinner, $150 club access)
Morning: Private guided tour of Meiji Shrine and Imperial Palace East Gardens with cultural insights into Shinto traditions (Cost: $250 for guide)
Afternoon: Traditional tea ceremony experience at Happo-en Garden followed by luxury kaiseki lunch (Cost: $150 ceremony, $300 lunch)
Evening: Robot Restaurant premium show with VIP seating and dinner package in Shinjuku (Cost: $300 for two)
Morning: Private car transfer to Mount Fuji (2 hours) with stop at Oshino Hakkai springs (Cost: $400 transfer)
Afternoon: Luxury ryokan experience at Hoshinoya Fuji with forest bathing and glamping activities, including private gourmet lunch (Cost: $800 experience)
Evening: Private onsen experience with kaiseki dinner at ryokan featuring views of Mount Fuji (included in ryokan stay)
Morning: Private photography tour of teamLab Borderless digital art museum with early access (Cost: $300 for guide and tickets)
Afternoon: Wagyu beef teppanyaki lunch at Ukai Tei (Michelin star) in Ginza followed by traditional Japanese garden visit (Cost: $400 lunch)
Evening: Exclusive members-only cocktail experience at Bar Benfiddich followed by late-night ramen at Ichiran (private booth) (Cost: $120 drinks, $50 ramen)
Morning: Private sushi-making class with master chef in Tsukiji outer market followed by market exploration (Cost: $350 for class)
Afternoon: Luxury spa treatment at Aman Tokyo with traditional Japanese therapies (2 hours) (Cost: $500 for two)
Evening: Farewell omakase experience at Sushi Saito (3 Michelin stars) with champagne celebration (Cost: $800 dinner)
recommendations: Book all Michelin restaurants 2-3 months in advance
Private car service recommended for luxury transportation (approx $200-400/day)
Carry cash for traditional establishments and temples
Learn basic Japanese greetings for cultural respect
Reserve ryokan stays well in advance for best availability
Consider hiring a professional photographer for special moments

daily_plan.afternoon: Traditional multi-course kaiseki lunch at Kikunoi (3 Michelin stars) followed by Sumida River cruise (Cost: $400 lunch, $60 cruise)
daily_plan.evening: Exclusive omakase dinner at Sukiyabashi Jiro (sushi experience) followed by cocktails at The Bellustar Tokyo sky bar with panoramic city views (Cost: $600 dinner, $100 drinks)

daily_plan.evening: Private onsen experience with kaiseki dinner at ryokan featuring views of Mount Fuji (included in ryokan stay)

daily_plan.morning: Private sushi-making class with master chef in Tsukiji outer market followed by market exploration (Cost: $350 for class)
daily_plan.afternoon: Luxury spa treatment at Aman Tokyo with traditional Japanese therapies (2 hours) (Cost: $500 for two)

plan:
Welcome to Paris - your perfect getaway awaits!
            
            With Clouds weather and temperatures around 12°C, 
            this is an ideal time to explore everything Paris has to offer.
            
            Your $10000 budget allows for a comfortable mix of must-see attractions, 
            authentic local experiences, and hidden gems that make Paris truly special. 
            
            From world-class dining to cultural landmarks, every moment of your journey 
            has been thoughtfully planned to create unforgettable memories.

activities: Morning: Private guided tour of the Louvre Museum with early access to see Mona Lisa and Venus de Milo (3 hours). Cost: $300 for two (includes private guide and skip-the-line tickets)
Afternoon: Lunch at Le Meurice Alain Ducasse (Michelin 3-star) followed by shopping at Galeries Lafayette luxury department store. Cost: Lunch $400, Shopping budget $1000
Evening: Eiffel Tower dinner experience at Le Jules Verne (Michelin star) with champagne toast at summit. Cost: $600 for dinner and tower access
Morning: Hot air balloon ride over Versailles with champagne breakfast (departure from Château de Versailles grounds). Cost: $800 for two
Afternoon: Private tour of Palace of Versailles including Hall of Mirrors and Marie Antoinette's Estate with luxury van transport. Cost: $500 (includes guide, tickets, and transport)
Evening: Michelin-star dinner at Gordon Ramsay au Trianon followed by night photography session at Versailles Gardens. Cost: $450
Morning: Private Seine River helicopter tour over Paris landmarks followed by visit to Sainte-Chapelle stained glass windows. Cost: $900 for helicopter, $50 for chapel tickets
Afternoon: Cooking class at Le Cordon Bleu with renowned chef, followed by lunch of prepared dishes. Cost: $600 for two
Evening: Cabaret show at Moulin Rouge with premium seating and champagne service, then late-night cocktails at Bar Hemingway. Cost: $400
Morning: Private vintage car tour of Montmartre including Sacré-Cœur Basilica and artist's square with personal photographer. Cost: $700 (includes car, driver, and photographer for 3 hours)
Afternoon: Lunch at La Maison Rose then private shopping experience in Saint-Germain-des-Prés luxury boutiques. Cost: Lunch $200, Shopping budget $800
Evening: Wellness retreat at Four Seasons Hotel Spa with couples massage and thermal facilities. Cost: $500
Morning: Day trip to Giverny for private tour of Monet's House and Gardens with art historian guide. Cost: $400 (includes private car transport and exclusive access)
Afternoon: Gourmet picnic in the gardens followed by visit to Musée des Impressionnismes. Cost: $300 for picnic and museum tickets
Evening: Return to Paris for dinner at L'Ami Louis (classic French bistro experience). Cost: $350
Morning: Private photography workshop at Luxembourg Gardens and Panthéon with professional photographer. Cost: $600 for 3-hour session
Afternoon: Lunch at Le Comptoir du Relais then antique shopping at Louvre des Antiquaires. Cost: Lunch $250, Shopping budget $500
Evening: Secret food tour through Marais district with 7-course tasting menu at hidden locations. Cost: $400
Morning: Adventure day: Private rock climbing session in Fontainebleau forest with expert guide and equipment. Cost: $450
Afternoon: Lunch at forest-edge gourmet restaurant then exploration of Château de Fontainebleau. Cost: Lunch $200, Castle tour $100
Evening: Wine tasting experience at Lavinia Paris with sommelier-led selection of rare French wines. Cost: $300
Morning: Private behind-the-scenes tour of Opéra Garnier including costume archives and private boxes. Cost: $350
Afternoon: Lunch at Café de la Paix then luxury shopping on Avenue Montaigne (Dior, Chanel, Louis Vuitton). Cost: Lunch $300, Shopping budget $1500
Evening: Farewell dinner at Epicure at Bristol Paris (3 Michelin stars) with wine pairing. Cost: $1200
Morning: Final relaxation: Private yoga session at hotel with views of Eiffel Tower, followed by last-minute souvenir shopping at La Grande Épicerie. Cost: Yoga $200, Shopping $300
Afternoon: Leisurely lunch at Les Ombres restaurant with panoramic views, then private car transfer to airport. Cost: Lunch $400, Transport $150
Evening: Departure from Paris CDG with VIP airport service. Cost: $200 for fast-track and lounge access
recommendations: Book all Michelin-star restaurants 2-3 months in advance
Private tours and experiences should be reserved early
Carry both cash and cards - many luxury shops prefer credit cards
Pack layers for the 12°C weather with rain protection
Download Uber and G7 taxi apps for premium car service
Consider hiring a private concierge for last-minute arrangements
Purchase museum passes for flexibility in scheduling
Learn basic French phrases for enhanced cultural experience

daily_plan.afternoon: Lunch at Le Meurice Alain Ducasse (Michelin 3-star) followed by shopping at Galeries Lafayette luxury department store. Cost: Lunch $400, Shopping budget $1000

            From world-class dining to cultural landmarks, every moment of your journey 
            has been thoughtfully planned to create unforgettable memories.
recommendations: Explore premium experiences and fine dining
Book accommodations early for better rates
Check visa requirements
Get travel insurance
Download offline maps

plan:
Welcome to Sindhuli - your perfect getaway awaits!
            
            With Clear weather and temperatures around 22°C, 
            this is an ideal time to explore everything Sindhuli has to offer.
            
            Your $1000 budget allows for a comfortable mix of must-see attractions, 
            authentic local experiences, and hidden gems that make Sindhuli truly special. 
            
            From world-class dining to cultural landmarks, every moment of your journey 
            has been thoughtfully planned to create unforgettable memories.

activities: Morning: Arrival at Sindhuli Gadhi via private car from Kathmandu (3-hour scenic drive). Check into Sindhuli Gadhi Luxury Resort with welcome drinks and traditional garland ceremony
Afternoon: Guided tour of Sindhuli Gadhi Fort - historical site of the 1767 battle between Nepali and British forces. Visit the victory monument and ancient cannons
Evening: Sunset viewing from resort's panoramic terrace followed by authentic Newari dinner at Fort View Restaurant
Morning: White water rafting on Sun Koshi River (Grade III-IV rapids) with professional guides and safety equipment. Includes riverside breakfast
Afternoon: Visit Kamalamai Temple complex - ancient Hindu shrine with intricate wood carvings. Participate in traditional puja ceremony
Evening: Cooking class with local chef learning to prepare momos and sel roti at Sindhuli Heritage Kitchen
Morning: Private guided hike through Tinpatan Forest with bird watching and nature photography. Spot rare Himalayan species and medicinal plants
Afternoon: Luxury picnic lunch at Rupakot Viewpoint overlooking Himalayan ranges. Visit local cheese factory for artisanal product tasting
Evening: Traditional Tharu cultural performance with fire dance and folk music at Cultural Heritage Center
Morning: Adventure zip-lining across Mahabharat Range with professional instructors and safety gear. Includes photography package
Afternoon: Visit Siddha Cave - one of Nepal's largest caves with stunning limestone formations. Guided exploration with headlamps provided
Evening: Private bonfire dinner at resort with live Nepali folk music performance
Morning: Yoga and meditation session with Himalayan guru at Sunrise Hill retreat. Includes Ayurvedic tea tasting
Afternoon: Luxury spa treatment at resort using local herbs and traditional techniques. Full body massage and herbal bath
Evening: Fine dining experience at The Orchid Restaurant featuring 7-course Nepali fusion cuisine with wine pairing
Morning: Private helicopter tour to Langtang Himalayan range with champagne breakfast at high altitude viewpoint
Afternoon: Visit local organic farm for agricultural experience and farm-to-table lunch. Learn about traditional farming methods
Evening: Stargazing session with astronomer guide using high-powered telescope at Dark Sky Observatory
Morning: Last-minute souvenir shopping at Sindhuli Handicraft Market for handmade textiles and local crafts
Afternoon: Farewell lunch at Mountain Peak Restaurant with panoramic views. Traditional Nepali thali with special desserts
Evening: Private car transfer back to Kathmandu with stop at scenic viewpoints for final photography
recommendations: Hire local guides for cultural insights
Carry Nepali rupees for local markets
Respect temple customs and remove shoes
Book adventure activities in advance during peak season
Try local specialties like yomari and gundruk
Carry light layers for changing mountain weather
Learn basic Nepali phrases for better interaction with locals
